channel.title: First Steps on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in First Steps on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Introduction With the Connector 365 Addressee Control App you can flexibly determine which destination addresses should be used for sending documents. You may want to send a document to the customer by default and not to the invoice recipient as is usual in the standard settings. Furthermore, you have the option of conveniently adding additional destination addresses per customer or vendor. You can also specify whether a recipient is to be reached via CC or BCC.

item.title: Test & Kauf
item.description: Testing and purchasing of the Connector 365 Addressee Control App Here you will find all help and learning resources about testing and purchasing the Connector 365 Addressee Control App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page.
